adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Powers up moves of the same type as the PokÃ©mon.

aerilate.name: Aerilate
aerilate.description: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.description: Damages the attacker if it contacts the PokÃ©mon with a finishing hit.

analytic.name: Analytic
analytic.description: Boosts move power when the PokÃ©mon moves last.

anger point.name: Anger Point
anger point.description: The PokÃ©mon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.

anticipation.name: Anticipation
anticipation.description: The PokÃ©mon can sense an opposing PokÃ©mon's dangerous moves.

aroma veil.name: Aroma Veil
aroma veil.description: Protects itself and its allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

aura break.name: Aura Break
aura break.description: The effects of "Aura" Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.

bad dreams.name: Bad Dreams
bad dreams.description: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing PokÃ©mon.

battery.name: Battery
battery.description: Powers up ally PokÃ©mon's special moves.

battle armor.name: Battle Armor
battle armor.description: Hard armor protects the PokÃ©mon from critical hits.

battle bond.name: Battle Bond
battle bond.description: Defeating an opposing PokÃ©mon strengthens the PokÃ©mon's bond with its Trainer, and it becomes Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.

beast boost.name: Beast Boost
beast boost.description: The PokÃ©mon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a PokÃ©mon.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Sp. Atk stat when it takes a  hit that causes its HP to become half or less.

big pecks.name: Big Pecks
big pecks.description: Protects the PokÃ©mon from Defense-lowering effects.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the PokÃ©mon's HP is low.

bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.description: Protects the PokÃ©mon from some ball and bomb moves.

cheek pouch.name: Cheek Pouch
cheek pouch.description: Restores HP as well when the PokÃ©mon eats a Berry.

chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Speed stat in sunshine.

clear body.name: Clear Body
clear body.description: Prevents other PokÃ©mon's moves or Abilities from lowering the PokÃ©mon's stats.

color change.name: Color Change
color change.description: The PokÃ©mon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.

comatose.name: Comatose
comatose.description: It's always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.

compound eyes.name: Compound Eyes
compound eyes.description: The PokÃ©mon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.

contrary.name: Contrary
contrary.description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

corrosion.name: Corrosion
corrosion.description: The PokÃ©mon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.

cursed body.name: Cursed Body
cursed body.description: May disable a move used on the PokÃ©mon.

cute charm.name: Cute Charm
cute charm.description: Contact with the PokÃ©mon may cause infatuation.

damp.name: Damp
damp.description: Prevents the use of explosive moves such as Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.

dancer.name: Dancer
dancer.description: When another PokÃ©mon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.

dark aura.name: Dark Aura
dark aura.description: Powers up each PokÃ©mon's Dark-type moves.

dazzling.name: Dazzling
dazzling.description: Surprises the opposing PokÃ©mon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

defeatist.name: Defeatist
defeatist.description: Halves the PokÃ©mon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.

delta stream.name: Delta Stream
delta stream.description: The PokÃ©mon changes the weather to eliminate all of the Flying type's weaknesses.

desolate land.name: Desolate Land
desolate land.description: The PokÃ©mon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.

disguise.name: Disguise
disguise.description: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the PokÃ©mon can protect it from an attack.

download.name: Download
download.description: Compares an opposing PokÃ©mon's Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk statâ€”whichever will be more effective.

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.description: The PokÃ©mon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

drought.name: Drought
drought.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the PokÃ©mon enters a battle.

dry skin.name: Dry Skin
dry skin.description: Restores HP in rain or when hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in sunshine, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.

early bird.name: Early Bird
early bird.description: The PokÃ©mon awakens twice as fast as other PokÃ©mon from sleep.

effect spore.name: Effect Spore
effect spore.description: Contact with the PokÃ©mon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.

electric surge.name: Electric Surge
electric surge.description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the PokÃ©mon enters a battle.

emergency exit.name: Emergency Exit
emergency exit.description: The PokÃ©mon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

fairy aura.name: Fairy Aura
fairy aura.description: Powers up each PokÃ©mon's Fairy-type moves.

filter.name: Filter
filter.description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

flame body.name: Flame Body
flame body.description: Contact with the PokÃ©mon may burn the attacker.

flare boost.name: Flare Boost
flare boost.description: Powers up special attacks when the PokÃ©mon is burned.

flash fire.name: Flash Fire
flash fire.description: Powers up the PokÃ©mon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

flower gift.name: Flower Gift
flower gift.description: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself and allies when it is sunny.

flower veil.name: Flower Veil
flower veil.description: Ally Grass-type PokÃ©mon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

fluffy.name: Fluffy
fluffy.description: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

forecast.name: Forecast
forecast.description: The PokÃ©mon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.

forewarn.name: Forewarn
forewarn.description: When it enters a battle, the PokÃ©mon can tell one of the moves an opposing PokÃ©mon has.

frisk.name: Frisk
frisk.description: When it enters a battle, the PokÃ©mon can check an opposing PokÃ©mon's held item.

full metal body.name: Full Metal Body
full metal body.description: Prevents other PokÃ©mon's moves or Abilities from lowering the PokÃ©mon's stats.

fur coat.name: Fur Coat
fur coat.description: Halves the damage from physical moves.

gale wings.name: Gale Wings
gale wings.description: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the  PokÃ©mon's HP is full.

galvanize.name: Galvanize
galvanize.description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

gluttony.name: Gluttony
gluttony.description: Makes the PokÃ©mon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.

gooey.name: Gooey
gooey.description: Contact with the PokÃ©mon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

grass pelt.name: Grass Pelt
grass pelt.description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Defense stat in  Grassy Terrain.

grassy surge.name: Grassy Surge
grassy surge.description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the PokÃ©mon enters a battle.

guts.name: Guts
guts.description: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the PokÃ©mon's Attack stat.

harvest.name: Harvest
harvest.description: May create another Berry after one is used.

healer.name: Healer
healer.description: Sometimes heals an ally's status condition.

heatproof.name: Heatproof
heatproof.description: The heatproof body of the PokÃ©mon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.

honey gather.name: Honey Gather
honey gather.description: The PokÃ©mon may gather Honey after a battle.

hustle.name: Hustle
hustle.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

hydration.name: Hydration
hydration.description: Heals status conditions if it's raining.

hyper cutter.name: Hyper Cutter
hyper cutter.description: The PokÃ©mon's proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other PokÃ©mon from lowering its Attack stat.

ice body.name: Ice Body
ice body.description: The PokÃ©mon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

illuminate.name: Illuminate
illuminate.description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild PokÃ©mon by illuminating the surroundings.

illusion.name: Illusion
illusion.description: Comes out disguised as the PokÃ©mon in the party's last spot.

immunity.name: Immunity
immunity.description: The immune system of the PokÃ©mon prevents it from getting poisoned.

imposter.name: Imposter
imposter.description: The PokÃ©mon transforms itself into the PokÃ©mon it's facing.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.description: Passes through the opposing PokÃ©mon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.

innards out.name: Innards Out
innards out.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.

inner focus.name: Inner Focus
inner focus.description: The PokÃ©mon's intensely focused, and that protects the PokÃ©mon from flinching.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.description: The PokÃ©mon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.description: The PokÃ©mon intimidates opposing PokÃ©mon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.

iron barbs.name: Iron Barbs
iron barbs.description: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with iron barbs.

justified.name: Justified
justified.description: Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack stat of the PokÃ©mon, for justice.

keen eye.name: Keen Eye
keen eye.description: Keen eyes prevent other PokÃ©mon from lowering this PokÃ©mon's accuracy.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.description: The PokÃ©mon can't use any held items.

leaf guard.name: Leaf Guard
leaf guard.description: Prevents status conditions in sunny weather.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.description: By floating in the air, the PokÃ©mon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

lightning rod.name: Lightning Rod
lightning rod.description: The PokÃ©mon draws in all Electric-type moves.  Instead of being hit by Electric-type moves,  it boosts its Sp. Atk.

limber.name: Limber
limber.description: Its limber body protects the PokÃ©mon from paralysis.

liquid ooze.name: Liquid Ooze
liquid ooze.description: Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.

liquid voice.name: Liquid Voice
liquid voice.description: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

long reach.name: Long Reach
long reach.description: The PokÃ©mon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

magic bounce.name: Magic Bounce
magic bounce.description: Reflects status moves, instead of getting hit by them.

magic guard.name: Magic Guard
magic guard.description: The PokÃ©mon only takes damage from attacks.

magician.name: Magician
magician.description: The PokÃ©mon steals the held item of a PokÃ©mon it hits with a move.

magma armor.name: Magma Armor
magma armor.description: The PokÃ©mon is covered with hot magma, which prevents the PokÃ©mon from becoming frozen.

magnet pull.name: Magnet Pull
magnet pull.description: Prevents Steel-type PokÃ©mon from escaping using its magnetic force.

marvel scale.name: Marvel Scale
marvel scale.description: The PokÃ©mon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.

mega launcher.name: Mega Launcher
mega launcher.description: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

merciless.name: Merciless
merciless.description: The PokÃ©mon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

minus.name: Minus
minus.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the PokÃ©mon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

misty surge.name: Misty Surge
misty surge.description: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the PokÃ©mon enters a battle.

mold breaker.name: Mold Breaker
mold breaker.description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

moody.name: Moody
moody.description: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.

motor drive.name: Motor Drive
motor drive.description: Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.

moxie.name: Moxie
moxie.description: The PokÃ©mon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any PokÃ©mon.

multiscale.name: Multiscale
multiscale.description: Reduces the amount of damage the PokÃ©mon takes when its HP is full.

multitype.name: Multitype
multitype.description: Changes the PokÃ©mon's type to match the Plate or Z-Crystal it holds.

mummy.name: Mummy
mummy.description: Contact with the PokÃ©mon changes the attacker's Ability to Mummy.

natural cure.name: Natural Cure
natural cure.description: All status conditions heal when the PokÃ©mon switches out.

no guard.name: No Guard
no guard.description: The PokÃ©mon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

normalize.name: Normalize
normalize.description: All the PokÃ©mon's moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

oblivious.name: Oblivious
oblivious.description: The PokÃ©mon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.

overcoat.name: Overcoat
overcoat.description: Protects the PokÃ©mon from things like sand, hail, and powder.

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the PokÃ©mon's HP is low.

own tempo.name: Own Tempo
own tempo.description: This PokÃ©mon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.description: Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.

pickup.name: Pickup
pickup.description: The PokÃ©mon may pick up the item an opposing PokÃ©mon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

pixilate.name: Pixilate
pixilate.description: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

plus.name: Plus
plus.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the PokÃ©mon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

poison heal.name: Poison Heal
poison heal.description: Restores HP if the PokÃ©mon is poisoned, instead of losing HP.

poison point.name: Poison Point
poison point.description: Contact with the PokÃ©mon may poison the attacker.

poison touch.name: Poison Touch
poison touch.description: May poison a target when the PokÃ©mon makes contact.

power construct.name: Power Construct
power construct.description: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the PokÃ©mon changes its form to Complete Forme.

power of alchemy.name: Power of Alchemy
power of alchemy.description: The PokÃ©mon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

prankster.name: Prankster
prankster.description: Gives priority to a status move.

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.description: By putting pressure on the opposing PokÃ©mon, it raises their PP usage.

primordial sea.name: Primordial Sea
primordial sea.description: The PokÃ©mon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.

prism armor.name: Prism Armor
prism armor.description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

protean.name: Protean
protean.description: Changes the PokÃ©mon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.

psychic surge.name: Psychic Surge
psychic surge.description: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the PokÃ©mon enters a battle.

pure power.name: Pure Power
pure power.description: Using its pure power, the PokÃ©mon doubles its Attack stat.

queenly majesty.name: Queenly Majesty
queenly majesty.description: Its majesty pressures the opposing PokÃ©mon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

quick feet.name: Quick Feet
quick feet.description: Boosts the Speed stat if the PokÃ©mon has a status condition.

rain dish.name: Rain Dish
rain dish.description: The PokÃ©mon gradually regains HP in rain.

rattled.name: Rattled
rattled.description: Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the PokÃ©mon and boost its Speed stat.

receiver.name: Receiver
receiver.description: The PokÃ©mon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

reckless.name: Reckless
reckless.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

refrigerate.name: Refrigerate
refrigerate.description: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

regenerator.name: Regenerator
regenerator.description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

rivalry.name: Rivalry
rivalry.description: Becomes competitive and deals more damage to PokÃ©mon of the same gender, but deals less to PokÃ©mon of the opposite gender.

rks system.name: RKS System
rks system.description: Changes the PokÃ©mon's type to match the memory disc it holds.

rock head.name: Rock Head
rock head.description: Protects the PokÃ©mon from recoil damage.

rough skin.name: Rough Skin
rough skin.description: This PokÃ©mon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.

run away.name: Run Away
run away.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild PokÃ©mon.

sand force.name: Sand Force
sand force.description: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.

sand rush.name: Sand Rush
sand rush.description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.

sand stream.name: Sand Stream
sand stream.description: The PokÃ©mon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

sand veil.name: Sand Veil
sand veil.description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's evasion in a sandstorm.

sap sipper.name: Sap Sipper
sap sipper.description: Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move, instead of taking damage.

schooling.name: Schooling
schooling.description: When it has a lot of HP, the PokÃ©mon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.

scrappy.name: Scrappy
scrappy.description: The PokÃ©mon can hit Ghost-type PokÃ©mon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

serene grace.name: Serene Grace
serene grace.description: Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring  when attacking.

shadow shield.name: Shadow Shield
shadow shield.description: Reduces the amount of damage the PokÃ©mon takes while its HP is full.

shadow tag.name: Shadow Tag
shadow tag.description: This PokÃ©mon steps on the opposing PokÃ©mon's shadow to prevent it from escaping.

shed skin.name: Shed Skin
shed skin.description: The PokÃ©mon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

sheer force.name: Sheer Force
sheer force.description: Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.

shell armor.name: Shell Armor
shell armor.description: A hard shell protects the PokÃ©mon from critical hits.

shield dust.name: Shield Dust
shield dust.description: This PokÃ©mon's dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.

shields down.name: Shields Down
shields down.description: When its HP becomes half or less, the PokÃ©mon's shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

simple.name: Simple
simple.description: The stat changes the PokÃ©mon receives are doubled.

skill link.name: Skill Link
skill link.description: Maximizes the number of times multi-strike moves hit.

slow start.name: Slow Start
slow start.description: For five turns, the PokÃ©mon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.

slush rush.name: Slush Rush
slush rush.description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits when attacking.

snow warning.name: Snow Warning
snow warning.description: The PokÃ©mon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.

solar power.name: Solar Power
solar power.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in sunny weather, but HP decreases every turn.

solid rock.name: Solid Rock
solid rock.description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

soul-heart.name: Soul-Heart
soul-heart.description: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a PokÃ©mon faints.

soundproof.name: Soundproof
soundproof.description: Soundproofing of the PokÃ©mon itself gives full  immunity to all sound-based moves.

speed boost.name: Speed Boost
speed boost.description: Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.

stakeout.name: Stakeout
stakeout.description: Doubles the damage dealt to the target's replacement if the target switches out.

stall.name: Stall
stall.description: The PokÃ©mon moves after all other PokÃ©mon do.

stamina.name: Stamina
stamina.description: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

stance change.name: Stance Change
stance change.description: The PokÃ©mon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move, and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King's Shield.

static.name: Static
static.description: The PokÃ©mon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.description: The PokÃ©mon's determination boosts the Speed stat each time the PokÃ©mon flinches.

stench.name: Stench
stench.description: By releasing stench when attacking, this PokÃ©mon may cause the target to flinch.

sticky hold.name: Sticky Hold
sticky hold.description: Items held by the PokÃ©mon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other PokÃ©mon.

storm drain.name: Storm Drain
storm drain.description: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit  by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.

strong jaw.name: Strong Jaw
strong jaw.description: The PokÃ©mon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.

suction cups.name: Suction Cups
suction cups.description: This PokÃ©mon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.

super luck.name: Super Luck
super luck.description: The PokÃ©mon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.

surge surfer.name: Surge Surfer
surge surfer.description: Doubles the PokÃ©mon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.description: Powers up Bug-type moves when the PokÃ©mon's HP is low.

sweet veil.name: Sweet Veil
sweet veil.description: Prevents itself and ally PokÃ©mon from falling asleep.

swift swim.name: Swift Swim
swift swim.description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Speed stat in rain.

symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
symbiosis.description: The PokÃ©mon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.

synchronize.name: Synchronize
synchronize.description: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the PokÃ©mon.

tangled feet.name: Tangled Feet
tangled feet.description: Raises evasion if the PokÃ©mon is confused.

tangling hair.name: Tangling Hair
tangling hair.description: Contact with the PokÃ©mon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

technician.name: Technician
technician.description: Powers up the PokÃ©mon's weaker moves.

telepathy.name: Telepathy
telepathy.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

teravolt.name: Teravolt
teravolt.description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

thick fat.name: Thick Fat
thick fat.description: The PokÃ©mon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

tinted lens.name: Tinted Lens
tinted lens.description: The PokÃ©mon can use "not very effective" moves to deal regular damage.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.description: Powers up Water-type moves when the PokÃ©mon's HP is low.

tough claws.name: Tough Claws
tough claws.description: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

toxic boost.name: Toxic Boost
toxic boost.description: Powers up physical attacks when the PokÃ©mon is poisoned.

trace.name: Trace
trace.description: When it enters a battle, the PokÃ©mon copies an opposing PokÃ©mon's Ability.

triage.name: Triage
triage.description: Gives priority to a healing move.

truant.name: Truant
truant.description: The PokÃ©mon can't use a move the following turn if it uses one.

turboblaze.name: Turboblaze
turboblaze.description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.description: When attacking, the PokÃ©mon ignores the target PokÃ©mon's stat changes.

unburden.name: Unburden
unburden.description: Boosts the Speed stat if the PokÃ©mon's held item is  used or lost.

unnerve.name: Unnerve
unnerve.description: Unnerves opposing PokÃ©mon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

victory star.name: Victory Star
victory star.description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

vital spirit.name: Vital Spirit
vital spirit.description: The PokÃ©mon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.

volt absorb.name: Volt Absorb
volt absorb.description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.

water absorb.name: Water Absorb
water absorb.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move, instead of taking damage.

water bubble.name: Water Bubble
water bubble.description: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the PokÃ©mon and prevents the PokÃ©mon from getting a burn.

water compaction.name: Water Compaction
water compaction.description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move.

water veil.name: Water Veil
water veil.description: The PokÃ©mon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the PokÃ©mon from getting a burn.

weak armor.name: Weak Armor
weak armor.description: Physical attacks to the PokÃ©mon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.

white smoke.name: White Smoke
white smoke.description: The PokÃ©mon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other PokÃ©mon from lowering its stats.

wimp out.name: Wimp Out
wimp out.description: The PokÃ©mon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

wonder guard.name: Wonder Guard
wonder guard.description: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the PokÃ©mon.

wonder skin.name: Wonder Skin
wonder skin.description: Makes status moves more likely to miss.

zen mode.name: Zen Mode
zen mode.description: Changes the PokÃ©mon's shape when HP is half or less.
